posts.post_content:
Shipping will be $3 for one card, and $1 each for additional (within the U.S.)

Paypal goods or MO only.

These are all really nice 3s.  They may have been graded before the introduction of half-grades, but that is just conjecture on my part.  The backs are all clean, but I'm happy to send scans if you shoot me your email.  Thanks for looking!

Pelty $42
Schmidt (faint but cool wet sheet transfer on back) $46 sold
Niles $42 Sold
Lattimore $42  sold
Rudolph (absolute stunner, only flaw is the bit of paper loss top left) $69
Flanagan $42  sold
Maloney $42  sold
EMAIL sent Luke.  Your PM box is full.
